summary: The adopted daughter of a privileged British politician uncovers a family secret in the weeks leading up to World War II.
cast: Romola Garai|Eddie Redmayne|Juno Temple|Toby Regbo|Christopher Lee|Corin Redgrave|Charlie Cox|David Tennant|Bill Nighy|Jeremy Northam|Katharine Burford|Jenny Agutter|Julie Christie|Hugh Bonneville|Asier Newman|Nicholas Blane|Jane Fowler|Sam Kubrick-Finney|Angela Terence|Jason White|Tom Goodman-Hill|Anthony Flanagan|Ryan Kiggell|Sarah Woodruff|Suzanne Burden|Richard Cordery|Joy McBrinn|Sharon Bower|Muriel Pavlow|George Anderson|Barry Ashton|Anna Bailey|Catherine Balavage|James Bartholomew|Alyn Gwyndaf|Sam Heydon|David Norfolk
keywords: woman uses a wheelchair|pre world war two|family relationships|family secret|secret
title: Glorious 39
